Name: Sriracha Chicken Soup
Author: ChelsEats
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'tomatoes', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'carrot', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or more to taste ground'}, {'ingredient': 'salt to taste', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'red', 'misc': 'sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'jalapeno pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'fresh', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sriracha chile sauce', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or to taste hot'}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'or to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chicken bouillon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cube', 'misc': 'or more to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'chicken', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'shredded cooked'}, {'ingredient': 'black beans', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'rinsed and drained 15 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 large tomatoes', '2 cups chopped carrot', '1 pinch ground cinnamon, or more to taste', '1 pinch salt to taste', 'red onion, sliced', '5 cloves garlic', '1 fresh jalapeno pepper', '3 tablespoons Sriracha hot chile sauce, or to taste', '1.5 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or to taste', '1.5 cups water', '1 cube chicken bouillon, or more to taste', '2 cups shredded cooked chicken', '1 (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Preheat an oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil.', 'Roast tomatoes in preheated oven on the prepared baking sheet until completely softened, about 25 minutes. Transfer tomatoes to a cutting board to cool.', 'Spread chopped carrot onto the prepared baking sheet  season with a pinch of cinnamon and salt.', 'Roast carrots in preheated oven until tender, about 25 minutes.', 'Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Toast onion slices, garlic cloves, and jalapeno pepper in the skillet until beginning to char, 5 to 7 minutes.', 'Peel cooled tomatoes and put in a blender bowl  add onion, garlic, jalapeno pepper, Sriracha chile sauce, and 1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon and puree until smooth.', 'Heat vegetable oil in a large stockpot or Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Stir pureed tomato mixture into the oil  cook and stir until the mixture thickens, about 5 minutes.', 'Pour water into the pot  add chicken bouillon and stir. Bring liquid to a simmer, reduce heat to medium-low, and cook mixture, stirring occasionally, until the liquid reduces slightly, about 15 minutes.', 'Stir chicken and black beans into the soup  bring again to a simmer and cook until beans are softened, about 15 minutes. Add carrots and cook to reheat the carrots, 2 to 3 minutes. Season soup with salt and pepper.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '230 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '22 g', 'Cholesterol': '37 mg', 'Fiber': '8 g', 'Protein': '17 g', 'Saturated Fat': '2 g', 'Sodium': '846 mg', 'Sugar': '4 g', 'Fat': '9 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Lentil Cakes (Patties)
Author: SUSANNE C SWISHER
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '2.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'brown lentils', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'dry'}, {'ingredient': 'wheat and barley nugget cereal', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'eg grape-nuts"'}, {'ingredient': 'walnuts', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'beaten'}, {'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion soup mix', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'envelope', 'misc': '1 ounce dry'}, {'ingredient': 'poultry seasoning', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'seasoned bread crumbs', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'dry'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2.5 cups water', '1 cup dry brown lentils', '1 cup wheat and barley nugget cereal (e.g. Grape-Nuts")', '0.5 cup chopped walnuts', '2 eggs, beaten', '0.25 cup milk', '1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix', '0.5 teaspoon poultry seasoning', '1 cup seasoned dry bread crumbs', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil']
Instructions: ['Place water and lentils in a saucepan  bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer until tender, about 30 minutes. Drain.', 'Combine cooked lentils, nutlike cereal nuggets, walnuts, eggs, milk, onion soup mix, and poultry seasoning in a large bowl  mix well using your hands. The mixture will be very thick. Set aside for 30 minutes, or refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.', 'Place bread crumbs in a shallow bowl. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Form lentil mixture into balls using an ice cream scoop  drop into bread crumbs and coat while flattening into patties. Add patties to the skillet  cook until nicely browned, about 5 minutes per side, depending on thickness of the patties.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '289 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '38 g', 'Cholesterol': '47 mg', 'Fiber': '7 g', 'Protein': '12 g', 'Saturated Fat': '2 g', 'Sodium': '683 mg', 'Sugar': '5 g', 'Fat': '11 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Air Fryer Donut Holes With Lemon Glaze
Author: Bren
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '1.25', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking powder', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'cut into small pieces cold'}, {'ingredient': 'whole milk', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'or more as needed'}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'confectioners sugar', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'fresh'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1.25 cups all-purpose flour', '2 tablespoons white sugar', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '0.25 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons cold unsalted butter, cut into small pieces', '0.25 cup whole milk, or more as needed', '1.5 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'cooking spray', "5 tablespoons confectioners' sugar", '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice']
Instructions: ['Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. Add butter and use a fork or pastry cutter to work butter into the flour mixture until it resembles coarse cornmeal.', 'Pour in milk and vanilla and combine until liquid is evenly distributed. Add additional milk, 1 tablespoon at a time, if dough does not come together. Knead dough for 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Preheat an air fryer to 320 degrees F (160 degrees C). Lightly spray the basket with cooking spray.', 'Divide dough into 12 equal portions and set 6 portions into the basket without touching. Lightly spray with cooking spray.', 'Air fry for 5 minutes, lightly spray again, then fry for an additional 2 minutes. Transfer donut holes to a wire rack and repeat with remaining 6 portions.', "Stir confectioners' sugar and lemon juice together in a very small bowl until well mixed. Drizzle lemon glaze over the donut holes and serve warm."]

Name: Balsamic-Glazed Stuffed Chicken Breasts with Pesto and Parmesan
Author: TomOB
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'skinless', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'boneless chicken breasts'}, {'ingredient': 'oregano', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'basil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'sun-dried tomato oil', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'divided'}, {'ingredient': 'parmesan cheese', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'basil pesto', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'drained chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'mozzarella cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'toothpicks', 'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'balsamic vinegar', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'brown sugar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried basil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '6 teaspoons sun-dried tomato oil, divided', '4 tablespoons shredded Parmesan cheese', '8 tablespoons basil pesto', '8 teaspoons drained and chopped oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', '1 cup shredded mozzarella cheese', 'toothpicks', '0.33333334326744 cup balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons brown sugar', '4 cloves garlic, minced']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Cut a pocket 3/4 of the way through the thickest side of each chicken breast. Season chicken with oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Pour 1 teaspoon sun-dried tomato oil on each breast, rubbing it and some of the seasoning inside each pocket. Fill each breast with 1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, 2 tablespoons basil pesto, 2 teaspoons sun-dried tomatoes, and 1/4 cup mozzarella cheese. Insert 3 to 4 toothpicks diagonally into each breast to seal.', 'Heat remaining 2 teaspoons sun-dried tomato oil in a cast iron skillet over medium heat. Add stuffed chicken breasts and cook until golden, about 2 minutes per side.', 'While the chicken is cooking, mix together balsamic vinegar, brown sugar, and garlic in a small bowl. Pour into the skillet around the chicken. Bring to a simmer and cook, stirring occasionally, until the balsamic glaze has thickened slightly, about 5 minutes. Spoon some glaze over each breast.', 'Transfer the skillet to the preheated oven and cook until cheese has melted and chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 15 to 20 minutes.', 'Remove toothpicks and drizzle with pan juices to serve.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '505 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '15 g', 'Cholesterol': '94 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '39 g', 'Saturated Fat': '10 g', 'Sodium': '652 mg', 'Sugar': '10 g', 'Fat': '32 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Spelt-Banana Bread
Author: Bibi
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'spelt flour', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'baking powder', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking soda', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'kosher salt', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sour cream', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsweetened applesauce', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'maple syrup', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'pure'}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1.25', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'bananas', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ripe', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'pecans', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'pecans', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or more to taste finely chopped'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['cooking spray', '2 cups spelt flour', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '0.5 teaspoon baking soda', '0.5 teaspoon kosher salt', '2 large eggs', '0.5 cup sour cream', '0.5 cup unsweetened applesauce', '0.5 cup pure maple syrup', '1.25 teaspoons vanilla extract', '4 ripe bananas', '1 cup chopped pecans', '2 tablespoons finely chopped pecans, or more to taste']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat an 8 1/2x4 1/2-inch loaf pan with cooking spray and set aside.', 'Combine spelt flour, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a medium-sized bowl and set aside.', 'Beat eggs in a large bowl until light yellow in color. Stir in sour cream, applesauce, maple syrup, and vanilla extract. Mash 2 bananas and add to the egg mixture. Dice remaining bananas and add to the bowl. Stir in 1 cup pecans. Pour flour mixture into the bowl with the egg-banana mixture and and stir just until flour is incorporated  do not over mix.', 'Pour batter into the prepared loaf pan and sprinkle 2 tablespoons pecans on top.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center of the loaf comes out clean, 60 to 65 minutes.', 'Place pan on a rack to cool, about 10 minutes. Turn loaf out onto the rack to cool completely.']

Name: Comforting Scalloped Potatoes
Author: Reynolds KitchensR
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'yukon gold potatoes', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'misc': 'peeled sliced 14-inch thick'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic clove', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'whole', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'melted plus more for greasing pan'}, {'ingredient': 'heavy cream', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'thyme', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'leaves only fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'parmesan cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'divided freshly grated'}, {'ingredient': 'and pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'aluminum foil', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'reynolds', 'misc': 'wrap®'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 pounds Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled, sliced 1/4-inch thick', '1 whole garlic clove', '4 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted, plus more for greasing pan', '2 cups heavy cream', '1 tablespoon fresh thyme, leaves only', '1 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, divided', 'Salt and pepper to taste', 'Reynolds Wrap® Aluminum Foil']
Instructions: ['Preheat oven to 375 degrees F. Line a rimmed baking sheet with Reynolds Wrap® Aluminum Foil. Set aside. The sheet will catch any spills in the oven later on.', 'Place the potato slices in a large pot and cover with cold water. Season with salt and bring to boil for 5 minutes. Drain in a colander and allow the potatoes to steam for 1 minute.', 'Rub a 10-inch baking dish with the garlic clove and generously butter the dish. Finely chop the garlic. Set aside.', 'With the heat off, transfer the potatoes back to the pot and add heavy cream, thyme, half of the Parmesan cheese, chopped garlic, melted butter, salt and pepper. Stir all of the ingredients together until the potatoes are well coated.', 'Layer the potatoes on top of each other in the buttered baking dish. Pour any remaining liquid on top of the potatoes. Place the baking dish on the prepared baking sheet. Cover the baking dish with foil and bake for 40 minutes. Remove the foil from the baking dish, add the remaining cheese and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until golden brown.']

Name: The Italian Irishman's Pie
Author: NikkHoff
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'italian sausage', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'bulk'}, {'ingredient': 'sausage drippings', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'margarine', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'apples', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'cored and sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'oregano', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'mashed potatoes', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'prepared'}, {'ingredient': 'melted margarine', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '2 tablespoons sausage drippings', '2 tablespoons margarine', '2 apples, cored and sliced', '1 large onion, sliced', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour', '1 cup water', '3 cups prepared mashed potatoes', '1 tablespoon melted margarine']
Instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).', 'Grease a 2-quart casserole dish.', 'Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat  cook and stir Italian sausage until browned and crumbly, about 10 minutes. Use a slotted spoon to transfer sausage to prepared casserole dish. Drain drippings and reserve 2 tablespoons drippings in the skillet.', 'Melt 2 tablespoons margarine in a separate skillet over medium heat  cook and stir apple and onion slices until tender, about 8 minutes. Place apple and onion in casserole dish with sausage.', 'Lightly stir sausage, apple, and onion together  season with salt, black pepper, and oregano.', 'Brown flour in reserved drippings in skillet over medium heat. Whisk water into flour until thick gravy forms, about 3 minutes.', 'Pour gravy over sausage mixture in the casserole dish  spread mashed potatoes over the top with a spoon, creating peaks. Lightly brush mashed potatoes with 1 tablespoon melted margarine.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the potatoes are lightly browned and the sausage mixture is bubbling, about 30 minutes.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '373 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '31 g', 'Cholesterol': '32 mg', 'Fiber': '3 g', 'Protein': '13 g', 'Saturated Fat': '7 g', 'Sodium': '1012 mg', 'Sugar': '8 g', 'Fat': '23 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Italian Stuffed Pork Loin with Olive Relish
Author: BANZAI
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'boneless pork loin', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'pounds', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'italian salad dressing', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': '', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'pitted black olives drained and chopped 10 ounce large'}, {'ingredient': 'spanish olives', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'jar', 'misc': 'drained and chopped 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'white', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'peppers', 'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'pepperoncini', 'misc': 'drained and chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'balsamic vinegar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cracked', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['3 pounds boneless pork loin', '1 cup Italian salad dressing', '1 (10 ounce) can large, pitted black olives, drained and chopped', '1 (8 ounce) jar Spanish olives, drained and chopped', '4 cloves garlic', '0.25 white onion, chopped', '10 pepperoncini peppers, drained and chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon balsamic vinegar', 'cracked black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Place pork in a shallow dish and coat with Italian dressing. Cover and refrigerate for two hours.', 'For the relish, stir the black olives, green olives, garlic, onion, and peppers together in a bowl  stir in olive oil and balsamic vinegar. Cover and refrigerate until ready to use.', 'When pork has finished marinating, preheat oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).', 'Slice the pork loin down the center lengthwise, cutting about 3/4 of the way through to the other side. Stuff full with the olive relish. Cover and bake in the preheated oven for about 2 hours, or until internal temperature has reached 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).']

Name: Pumpkin and Butternut Creamed Soup
Author: Sandi
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'butternut squash', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'cubed'}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'carrots', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'celery', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'heavy cream', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sour cream', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chicken broth', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'nutmeg', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sugar pumpkins', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'small', 'misc': 'halved and seeded'}, {'ingredient': 'asiago cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'divided grated'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['6 cups cubed butternut squash', '2 tablespoons butter', '3 carrots, chopped', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 cup chopped celery', '1 cup heavy cream', '1 cup sour cream', '8 cups chicken broth', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'salt to taste', '6 small sugar pumpkins, halved and seeded', '1 cup grated Asiago cheese, divided']
Instructions: ['Place the butternut squash cubes in a saucepan, cover with water, and bring to a boil over medium heat. Reduce heat  simmer until tender, about 30 minutes. Drain off water, and set the squash aside.', 'Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a baking sheet with cooking spray.', 'Melt the butter in a large skillet, then cook the carrots, onion, and celery until tender, about 10 minutes. Place the vegetables, cooked butternut squash, cream, and sour cream into a blender. Cover, and puree until smooth, working in batches if necessary. Transfer the blended vegetables to a soup pot  stir in the chicken broth, nutmeg, black pepper, and salt. Bring the mixture to a simmer over medium-low heat, then simmer gently for about 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.', 'While the soup is simmering, place the pumpkin halves, cut sides up, on the prepared baking sheet, and bake in the preheated oven until the pumpkin flesh is cooked through, 15 to 20 minutes. Start the broiler, and place the pumpkin halves under the broiler about 6 inches from the heat source to brown the cut side of the pumpkins, if desired. Place a pumpkin bowl into a decorative soup plate  serve soup in the pumpkin bowls, and sprinkle each serving with Asiago cheese.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '275 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '28 g', 'Cholesterol': '52 mg', 'Fiber': '4 g', 'Protein': '7 g', 'Saturated Fat': '10 g', 'Sodium': '820 mg', 'Sugar': '7 g', 'Fat': '17 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Teriyaki Chicken Kabobs
Author: karatekidguy
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'skinless', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'boneless chicken breast halves 6 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'teriyaki marinade', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'kabob sticks', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'bamboo', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sweet onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'red bell pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'pineapple', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'drained 20 ounce chunks'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 (6 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '1 cup teriyaki marinade', '4 bamboo kabob sticks', '1 medium sweet onion', '1 medium red bell pepper', '1 (20 ounce) can pineapple chunks, drained']
Instructions: ['Cut each chicken breast into 10 pieces. Place in a glass bowl and cover with teriyaki marinade. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 30 minutes.', 'Soak bamboo kabob sticks in water for 30 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, cut onion into four 1-inch square pieces. Repeat with bell pepper. Set aside 14 pineapple chunks and reserve any extra for another use.', 'Preheat an outdoor grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate.', 'Remove chicken from the marinade and shake off excess. Discard the remaining marinade. Dividing ingredients evenly, alternating layers of chicken, onion, pepper, and pineapple on each kabob stick.', 'Place kabobs on the preheated grill and cook until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 4 to 5 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Be careful when turning kabobs, they will be hot.']

Name: Spicy Grilled Shrimp from Reynolds Wrap®
Author: Reynolds KitchensR
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'non-stick aluminum foil', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'reynolds', 'misc': 'wrap®'}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'worcestershire sauce', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'seafood seasoning', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon pepper', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'basil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'shrimp', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'peeled and deveined medium raw'}]

Instructions: ['Combine lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, seafood seasoning, lemon pepper, basil and garlic. Gradually add oil, stirring mixture until thickened. Instructions: ['Cut beef into 1/4-inch thick slices. Combine soy sauce, water, Worcestershire sauce, sugar, salt, onion powder, garlic powder, and liquid smoke. Ingredients_Raw: ['1 cup uncooked long grain white rice', '2 cups water', '0.5 cup chopped walnuts', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 large red onion, sliced, separated into rings', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '1 cup vegetable broth', '0.5 teaspoon dried sage', '0.5 teaspoon dried tarragon', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 (14 ounce) package firm tofu, drained and cut into 1/2 inch strips', '1 cup crumbled blue cheese']
Instructions: ['Bring the rice and water to a boil in a pot. Cover, reduce heat to low, and simmer 20 minutes.', 'Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place the walnuts on a baking dish, and bake 10 minutes, stirring frequently, until lightly toasted. Remove from heat.', 'Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat, and cook the onion until tender. Mix in garlic, and cook 1 minute. Stir in the broth, and season with sage, tarragon, salt, and pepper. Continue cooking 10 minutes, stirring often.', 'Heat the oil in a separate skillet. Dredge the tofu in the toasted walnuts, and cook in the skillet about 4 minutes on each side, until lightly browned. Mix any remaining walnuts and the onion and broth mixture into the skillet. Cook until heated through. Serve over rice, and top with blue cheese.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '415 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '34 g', 'Cholesterol': '22 mg', 'Fiber': '3 g', 'Protein': '20 g', 'Saturated Fat': '7 g', 'Sodium': '416 mg', 'Sugar': '2 g', 'Fat': '23 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Cheese and Lemon Blintzes
Author: onlyrose
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cream cheese', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'softened 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'raisins', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'yolks', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'egg', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon zest', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'or as needed'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 cup all-purpose flour', '3 eggs', '0.5 teaspoon salt', 'cooking spray', '2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '0.5 cup raisins', '3 tablespoons white sugar, or to taste', '2 egg yolks', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '0.5 teaspoon vanilla extract', '0.25 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon butter, or as needed']
Instructions: ['Mix flour, eggs, and salt together in a bowl until smooth and creamy.', 'Lightly coat a small skillet with cooking spray. Pour 2 to 3 tablespoons of batter into the skillet. Swirl around until even and then place skillet over medium heat. Cook until sides begin to curl away, about 2 minutes. Turn and cook other side until lightly browned, about 1 minute more. Put onto a plate.', 'Mix cream cheese, raisins, sugar, egg yolks, lemon peel, vanilla extract, and cinnamon together in a bowl to make the filling. Place 2 to 3 teaspoons of filling on each blintz and roll up like a small burrito.', 'Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a skillet over medium heat. Cook the filled blintzes, turning carefully, until lightly browned, about 30 seconds each.']

Name: Chicken and Mushroom Chimichangas
Author: John Mitzewich
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'divided'}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'poblano peppers', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'mushrooms', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'freshly ground'}, {'ingredient': 'skinless', 'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'boneless chicken breast halves cut into 12-inch cubes'}, {'ingredient': 'cumin', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'chipotle', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'mexican oregano', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'or as needed'}, {'ingredient': 'pepperjack cheese', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'cayenne pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'flour tortillas', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'egg', 'misc': 'beaten'}, {'ingredient': 'guacamole', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sour cream', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salsa', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cilantro leaves', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 tablespoon vegetable oil, divided', '0.5 cup diced onion', '0.5 cup diced poblano peppers', '0.5 cup sliced mushrooms', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '12 ounces skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '0.25 teaspoon ground cumin', '0.25 teaspoon ground chipotle', '1 pinch dried Mexican oregano', '1 tablespoon water, or as needed', '4 ounces shredded pepperjack cheese', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste', '4 large flour tortillas', '1 egg white, beaten', '0.25 cup guacamole', '0.25 cup sour cream', '0.25 cup salsa', '0.25 cup cilantro leaves']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a heavy baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone baking mat.', 'Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil in a heavy skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, poblano peppers, and mushrooms  season with salt and black pepper. Cook until soft, about 5 minutes  continue cooking until vegetables begin to brown, 5 to 10 minutes more.', 'Move vegetables to edges of the skillet, leaving a space in the center. Drizzle 1 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil into center. Add chicken pieces to the center  season with cumin, ground chipotle, Mexican oregano, salt, and black pepper. Cook and stir until chicken pieces are browned, about 5 minutes.', 'Stir chicken and vegetable mixture together. Off heat, drizzle water over chicken mixture  scrape browned bits of food off the bottom of the skillet with a wooden spoon. Transfer mixture to a bowl  set aside to cool. Wipe the skillet clean.', 'Stir pepper Jack cheese into chicken mixture to combine  season with cayenne pepper, salt, and black pepper.', 'Heat the same skillet over medium heat until hot. Add 1 tortilla to the skillet  heat until warmed and flexible, about 30 seconds per side.', 'Place tortilla onto a work surface  spoon 1/4 filling in a line across middle of the tortilla. Fold bottom of tortilla just over filling  brush top and exposed inside parts of tortilla with egg white. Fold right and left sides towards the center like an envelope, enclosing filling. Roll tortilla to enclose filling in a rectangular packet. Repeat with remaining tortillas and filling.', 'Heat remaining 2 tablespoons vegetable oil in the skillet over medium heat. Add chimichangas  cook on both sides until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Transfer to the prepared baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until tortilla is puffed up, golden brown, and outside is crisp, 12 to 15 minutes. Spoon 1 tablespoon guacamole, 1 tablespoon sour cream, 1 tablespoon salsa, and 1 tablespoon cilantro onto each chimichanga to serve.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '618 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '48 g', 'Cholesterol': '85 mg', 'Fiber': '4 g', 'Protein': '33 g', 'Saturated Fat': '11 g', 'Sodium': '848 mg', 'Sugar': '4 g', 'Fat': '32 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Instructions: ['Preheat a grill for medium heat.', 'In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, raisins, onion, garlic, salt, pepper and Worcestershire sauce. Mix lightly using your hands, then divide into 6 portions. Flatten each portion into a patty.', 'Place burgers on the grill and cook for about 7 minutes per side, or until well done. Name: Roasted Mixed Potatoes with Fresh Herbs and Burrata
Author: chpmnk42
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'potatoes', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'misc': 'chopped mixed'}, {'ingredient': 'lemon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': 'zested and juiced divided'}, {'ingredient': 'extra virgin olive oil', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'divided'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'kosher', 'misc': 'freshly ground'}, {'ingredient': 'roughly dill', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'roughly basil leaves', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'chives', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'chopped fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'burrata cheese', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 pounds mixed potatoes, chopped', '1 medium lemon, zested and juiced, divided', '4 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, divided', '2 cloves garlic, minced', 'kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '0.25 cup roughly chopped fresh dill', '0.25 cup roughly chopped basil leaves', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '8 ounces burrata cheese']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).', 'Toss potatoes, lemon juice, 2 tablespoons olive oil, garlic, and a small pinch each of kosher salt and pepper together on a large baking sheet.', 'Roast in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Name: Loaded Chicken Breasts for One
Author: Buckwheat Queen
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'bacon', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chicken breasts', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'skinless', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'cheddar cheese', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'baby spinach leaves', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sour cream', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chives', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'thinly sliced'}]

Name: Pecan Pie Bites from Scratch
Author: Yoly
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'at room temperature'}, {'ingredient': 'cream cheese', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'softened'}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cooking spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'nonstick', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'brown sugar', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'egg', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'melted'}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'pecans', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'finely chopped'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['0.5 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature', '3 ounces cream cheese, softened', '1 cup all-purpose flour', 'nonstick cooking spray', '0.75 cup brown sugar', '1 large egg', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter, melted', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '0.25 teaspoon salt', '0.5 cup finely chopped pecans']
Instructions: ['Beat butter and cream cheese for crust with an electric mixer until smooth. Add flour and mix until fully combined. Cover and refrigerate dough for 1 hour.', 'Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Remove dough from the refrigerator. Author: Karen Gibson
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'poppy seeds', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking powder', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking soda', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon flavored yogurt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon zest', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'grated'}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '0.75 cup white sugar', '0.25 cup poppy seeds', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '0.5 teaspoon salt', '2 eggs', '1 cup lemon flavored yogurt', '0.25 cup vegetable oil', '1 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '0.33333334326744 cup lemon juice', '3 tablespoons white sugar']
Instructions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C). Lightly grease a 12-cup muffin pan.', 'Combine flour, 3/4 cup sugar, poppy seeds, baking powder, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.', 'Mix eggs, yogurt, oil, and lemon zest together in a separate bowl until well blended. Pour over flour mixture, then mix until just combined.', 'Spoon batter evenly between the prepared muffin cups, filling each ¾ full.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, about 15 minutes. Let muffins cool in the pan for 5 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, make the glaze: Stir lemon juice and 3 tablespoons sugar together until sugar dissolves.', 'Pierce the top of each muffin several times with a wooden skewer while they are still warm. Slowly pour about 1 tablespoon lemon glaze over the top of each muffin.', 'Let muffins continue to cool in the pan until glaze has set, about 10 minutes more.']

Name: Chokladbiskvier (Swedish Chocolate Meringue Cookies)
Author: sonjagroset
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'whites', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'egg', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'slivered almonds', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'finely ground blanched'}, {'ingredient': 'bread crumbs', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'confectioners sugar', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsweetened cocoa powder', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'at room temperature'}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'semisweet chocolate', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'chunks'}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or more as needed'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['3 egg whites', '1 cup white sugar', '1 cup blanched slivered almonds, finely ground', '0.75 cup bread crumbs', "1.5 cups confectioners' sugar", '0.25 cup unsweetened cocoa powder', '1 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 pinch salt, or to taste', '5 ounces semisweet chocolate chunks', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter, or more as needed']
Instructions: ['Beat egg whites in a bowl until medium peaks form. Sprinkle in white sugar with the mixer running  beat until well combined. Fold in ground almonds and bread crumbs until well combined. Let cookie batter rest for 10 to 15 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.', "Stir confectioners' sugar and cocoa powder together in a bowl.", "Beat 1 cup butter in another bowl until fluffy. Add confectioners' sugar-cocoa mixture in 2 to 3 additions, mixing thoroughly after each addition. Beat in vanilla extract and salt until combined.", 'Scoop meringue batter onto baking sheets in 2-tablespoon portions.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until firm but not brown, 10 to 12 minutes. Cool on the baking sheets for 5 minutes. Transfer cookies to a rack to cool completely, about 10 minutes.', 'Flip each meringue cookie over  frost with 1 to 2 tablespoons of buttercream mixture. Arrange on a plate or baking sheet.', 'Freeze cookies until firm, 30 to 45 minutes.', 'Combine semisweet chocolate and 6 tablespoons butter in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave in 30-second intervals, stirring after each interval, until glaze is smooth.', 'Dip each cookie into glaze, frosted-side down, until coated. Refrigerate or freeze until set.']

Ingredients_Raw: ['4 slices bacon, diced', '1 onion, diced', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '4 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed', '1 (16 ounce) package frozen corn kernels', '4 cups vegetable stock, or more as needed', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '0.75 cup heavy cream', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '0.25 cup shredded Cheddar cheese, or to taste', '2 tablespoons chopped green onions, or to taste']
Instructions: ['Set a 6-quart multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) to Saute function. Add bacon and cook and stir until brown and crispy, 6 to 8 minutes. Transfer to a paper towel-lined plate, leaving any scraps and grease in the pot. Add onions and garlic. Cook, stirring frequently, until onions are translucent and garlic is fragrant, 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in bacon, potatoes, corn, vegetable stock, thyme, cayenne pepper, then the salt and pepper.', "Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions  set timer for 10 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.", "Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid.", 'Whisk together heavy cream and flour in a small bowl. Set aside.', 'Select Sauté setting and bring to a boil. Stir in the heavy cream mixture and cook, stirring frequently, until mixture is slightly thickened, 4 to 5 minutes. If mixture is too thick, add additional vegetable stock as needed to reach desired consistency.', 'Garnish with shredded Cheddar cheese and green onions. Serve immediately.']

Spread pecans onto a baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until pecans are toasted and fragrant, 5 to 10 minutes.', 'Spray a 9-inch pie pan with cooking spray. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.', "Press the cinnamon rolls into the bottom of the pie pan, sealing edges together to create the 'crust'.", 'Whisk corn syrup and brown sugar together in a bowl until thick and sticky. Add butter and whisk until mixture is smooth. Whisks eggs, 1 at a time, into brown sugar mixture, whisking well after each addition, until eggs are fully incorporated. Stir cinnamon, vanilla extract, and salt into brown sugar mixture.', "Layer the toasted pecans over the cinnamon roll 'crust'. Pour the brown sugar mixture over pecans. Place the pie on the prepared baking sheet.", 'Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Cover crust with pieces of aluminum foil to avoid burning.', 'Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Continue baking until pie is set in the middle, 20 to 25 minutes. Cool pie for 15 minutes.', 'Place cream cheese frosting in a microwave-safe bowl  heat in microwave until frosting is thinned and pourable, about 30 seconds. Drizzle frosting over pie and set aside until frosting has slightly hardened, about 20 minutes.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '591 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '71 g', 'Cholesterol': '65 mg', 'Fiber': '3 g', 'Protein': '6 g', 'Saturated Fat': '8 g', 'Sodium': '575 mg', 'Sugar': '34 g', 'Fat': '34 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Triple Berry Cheesecake Poke Cake
Author: Julie Hubert
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'yellow cake mix', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '1525 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'graham cracker crumbs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'finely crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'melted'}, {'ingredient': 'strawberries', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'hulled and chopped fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'blackberries', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'raspberries', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sweetened condensed milk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'divided 14 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'cream cheese', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'softened 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'sea salt', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['cooking spray', '1 (15.25 ounce) package yellow cake mix', '1 cup water', '3 eggs', '0.25 cup vegetable oil', '2 cups finely crushed graham cracker crumbs', '6 tablespoons unsalted butter, melted', '8 ounces fresh strawberries, hulled and chopped', '8 ounces fresh blackberries', '6 ounces fresh raspberries', '0.33333334326744 cup white sugar', '0.33333334326744 cup water', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, divided', '2 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '0.25 cup fresh lemon juice', '0.25 teaspoon sea salt']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray  line with parchment paper.', 'Combine cake mix, 1 cup water, eggs, and vegetable oil in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment  beat on low speed for 30 seconds. Increase speed to medium  beat for 2 minutes. Pour batter into the prepared dish.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until cake is golden brown, about 25 minutes. Cool at room temperature for 10 minutes. Keep oven on.', 'Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.', 'Combine graham cracker crumbs and melted butter in a bowl  spread evenly onto the prepared baking sheet.', 'Bake until slightly golden, about 10 minutes. Cool to room temperature  store crumbs in an airtight container.', 'Meanwhile, combine strawberries, blackberries, raspberries, sugar, 1/3 cup water, and 2 tablespoons lemon juice in a saucepan  bring to a boil. Reduce heat  simmer, stirring occasionally, until fruit is very soft, 7 to 8 minutes. Mash berries together with a fork  cool for 5 minutes.', 'Poke 30 holes (5 rows of 6 holes each) into cake using the handle of a wooden spoon. Drizzle 1/3 cup sweetened condensed milk over entire cake  pour berry mixture over cake, spreading using a spatula, ensuring mixture goes into holes. Cover cake  refrigerate at least 1 hour.', 'Place cream cheese in the bowl of a stand mixer fitted with the whisk attachment  whisk on high speed until very smooth, at least 3 minutes. Add remaining sweetened condensed milk, 1/4 cup lemon juice, and salt  whisk for 1 minute. Spread cream cheese mixture over cooled cake. Cover cake  chill 3 hours to overnight.', 'Cut cake into 12 large pieces  top with graham cracker crumbs.']

Instructions: ['Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Name: Sausage and Ricotta Ravioli with Pesto Sauce
Author: foodietx
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'white onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'quartered'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'or more as needed'}, {'ingredient': 'italian sausage links', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'links', 'misc': 'casings removed 35 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'ricotta cheese', 'quantity': '2.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'paprika', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cayenne pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'wonton wrappers', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '16 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'egg', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'beaten'}, {'ingredient': 'pine nuts', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'basil', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'chopped fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'balsamic vinegar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 large white onion, quartered', '3 cloves garlic', '0.25 cup extra-virgin olive oil, or more as needed', '5 (3.5 ounce) links Italian sausage links, casings removed', '2.5 cups ricotta cheese', '1 tablespoon paprika', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (16 ounce) package wonton wrappers', '1 egg, beaten', '0.33333334326744 cup pine nuts', '2 cups chopped fresh basil', '5 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1 dash balsamic vinegar', '2 cloves garlic', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Place onion and 3 cloves of garlic in a food processor. Process while drizzling in 1/4 cup of olive olive, until smooth. Set aside.', 'Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and stir in the sausage. Cook and stir until the sausage is crumbly, evenly browned, and no longer pink, about 10 minutes. Drain and discard any excess grease. Stir in onion mixture, reduce heat to medium, and cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Pour mixture into the food processor along with the ricotta cheese. Process until smooth, streaming more olive oil as necessary. Stir in paprika and cayenne, and season with salt and pepper to taste.', 'Spoon about 1 tablespoon full of the sausage mixture onto the center of one wonton wrapper. Brush the edges of the wrapper with the egg, then fold the wrapper into a triangle, sealing the edges tightly. Place ravioli on a baking sheet sprayed with cooking spray. Repeat until all the wonton wrappers have been filled. Cover and refrigerate the ravioli until ready to cook.', 'Meanwhile, place the basil and pine nuts in a clean food processor. Pulse 4 or 5 times, then add 2 garlic cloves. Pulse 2 or 3 more times, then process until smooth while slowly adding in 5 tablespoons of olive oil. Stir in the balsamic vinegar, and season to taste with salt and pepper.', 'Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Once the water is boiling, stir in the ravioli. Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the ravioli float to the top and the filling is hot, 3 to 4 minutes. Drain well in a colander set in the sink. Place ravioli in a large bowl and toss with 4 to 5 tablespoons of pesto.']

Instructions: ['Divide tostada shells between 4 plates.', 'Combine back beans, avocado, and lime juice in a bowl. Gently stir to combine. Divide mixture between tostada shells. Name: Quinoa and Arugula Salad with Chicken
Author: adsomers
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'quinoa', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'uncooked'}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'boneless', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'skinless chicken breast 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic powder', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'oregano', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'paprika', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': 'juiced'}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'dijon mustard', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'honey', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'arugula', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '5 ounce'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 cups water', '1 cup uncooked quinoa', '1 pinch salt', '1 (8 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breast', '0.5 teaspoon salt', '0.25 teaspoon ground black pepper', '0.25 teaspoon garlic powder', '0.25 teaspoon ground oregano', '0.25 teaspoon ground paprika', '1.5 teaspoons olive oil', '1 medium lemon, juiced', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon honey', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 (5 ounce) package arugula']
Instructions: ['Bring water, quinoa, and a pinch of salt to a boil in a medium saucepan. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until quinoa is tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Fluff with a fork and set aside to cool completely.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Line a small baking dish with foil.', 'Heat a grill pan over medium-high heat. Transfer chicken to the prepared baking dish.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink and the juices run clear, about 20 minutes. Cut into ½-inch cubes.', 'Combine lemon juice, olive oil, Dijon, and honey in a cup. Season with salt and pepper. Whisk rapidly until dressing is smooth.', 'Combine arugula, quinoa, and chicken in a large mixing bowl. Add dressing and toss to coat.']

Instructions: ['Place dry kidney beans into a large container and cover with several inches of cool water  let soak, 8 hours to overnight.', 'Drain and rinse the kidney beans. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions  set timer for 8 minutes. Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build.", "Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions for 12 minutes. Release pressure carefully using the quick-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 5 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Set potatoes aside and allow to cool. Drain and rinse beans, setting aside.", 'Inspect the brown lentils for any impurities. Pour boiling water over the brown lentils in a bowl and set aside.', 'Turn on the Saute function of the Instant Pot. Add olive oil, followed by mushrooms, onion, bell pepper, celery, large carrot, habanero, shallot, garlic, parsley, oregano, and Italian seasoning. Sauté until fragrant and the onion has become translucent, 5 to 7 minutes.', 'Drain and rinse the soaked brown lentils.', 'Add the cooked kidney beans, red lentils, buckwheat groats, drained brown lentils, tomatoes, small carrots, zucchini, and green beans to the Instant Pot  cook and stir until well mixed, 10 to 15 minutes. Turn off the Sauté function. Close the cover during the Saute function as much as possible to keep in any moisture.', 'Add water until the vegetables are covered by almost 1 inch. Add bouillon. Stir everything. Close and lock the lid.', 'Set the Soup function for 25 minutes.', "Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions for 15 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid. Add miso, yeast extract, liquid smoke, and apple cider vinegar. Mix and serve with salt and pepper as desired."]

Name: Chicken and Waffle Sandwich
Author: thedailygourmet
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking powder', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'granulated garlic', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'italian seasoning', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'such as trader joes® 21 seasoning salute'}, {'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'warm'}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salted butter', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'melted'}, {'ingredient': 'cheddar cheese', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'frozen breaded chicken breast fillets', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '24 ounce such as kirkwood®'}, {'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 cups all-purpose flour', '4 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '0.25 teaspoon granulated garlic', "0.25 teaspoon Italian seasoning (such as Trader Joe's® 21 Seasoning Salute)", '1.5 cups warm milk', '2 large eggs', '0.33333334326744 cup salted butter, melted', '0.33333334326744 cup shredded Cheddar cheese', '1 (24 ounce) package frozen breaded chicken breast fillets (such as Kirkwood®)', 'cooking spray', '1 pinch salt']
Instructions: ['Mix flour, baking powder, salt, garlic, and seasoning in a large bowl  set aside. Beat milk, eggs, and melted butter together in a separate bowl. Pour milk mixture into the flour mixture  beat until blended. Fold in Cheddar cheese.', 'Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 5 minutes.', 'Air fry chicken for 7 minutes. Turn chicken pieces and cook for another 6 minutes.', "Meanwhile, preheat the oven to 200 degrees F (95 degrees C). Preheat a waffle iron according to manufacturer's instructions. Spray waffle iron with nonstick cooking spray.", 'Ladle 3 tablespoons batter on the waffle iron. Cook until waffle is golden brown and the iron stops steaming, about 5 minutes. Place on a lined baking sheet and keep warm in the oven. Repeat with remaining batter.', 'Assemble waffle and chicken sandwiches once all the waffles are cooked.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '567 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '46 g', 'Cholesterol': '226 mg', 'Fiber': '3 g', 'Protein': '46 g', 'Saturated Fat': '11 g', 'Sodium': '1808 mg', 'Sugar': '5 g', 'Fat': '21 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Lengua (Beef Tongue) Stir-Fry
Author: Helena Unzueta
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'tongue', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'beef', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'green chile peppers', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'fresh', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'white', 'misc': 'sliced thinly'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatoes', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'small', 'misc': 'halved and sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'whole kernel corn', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'drained 15 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 beef tongue', '5 fresh green chile peppers', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 white onion, sliced thinly', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '4 small tomatoes, halved and sliced', '2 (15 ounce) cans whole kernel corn, drained', 'salt to taste']
Instructions: ['Wash tongue and place in a large pot of water to cover. Simmer until no longer pink, about 50 minutes per pound of tongue. Remove from water and let rest until cool enough to handle. Peel skin from tongue and trim gristle. Cut into 1/4 inch slices.', 'Place whole peppers in a skillet over medium-high heat and roast, turning, until all sides are charred. Let cool, rub off skins. Remove stems and seeds.', 'Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute chile peppers, onion and garlic until onion is translucent. Stir in tongue and continue to cook until tongue is brown, 5 to 10 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and cook until limp, 5 minutes. Pour in corn and heat through, 2 to 5 minutes. Season with salt. Serve immediately.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '384 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '21 g', 'Cholesterol': '131 mg', 'Fiber': '3 g', 'Protein': '22 g', 'Saturated Fat': '8 g', 'Sodium': '319 mg', 'Sugar': '5 g', 'Fat': '24 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Coconut Milk Rice Pudding
Author: John Mitzewich
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'yolk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'egg', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '2.75', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'coconut milk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'arborio rice', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '0.125', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'mango', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'finely diced'}, {'ingredient': 'chinese five-spice powder', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 tablespoons milk', '1 egg yolk', '2.75 cups milk', '1 cup coconut milk', '1 tablespoon butter', '0.33333334326744 cup Arborio rice', '0.25 cup white sugar', 'salt to taste', '0.125 teaspoon vanilla extract', '0.25 cup finely diced mango', '1 pinch Chinese five-spice powder']
Instructions: ['Beat 2 tablespoons milk and egg yolk together in a small bowl  set aside.', 'Combine 2 3/4 cups milk and coconut milk in a saucepan over medium heat until just begins to steam  reduce heat to low.', 'Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir in rice  cook for 1 minute. Pour in 1/2 cup coconut milk mixture, stirring constantly, until liquid is completely absorbed and rice is creamy  repeat process until milk mixture is completely incorporated and rice has a tender, yet slightly firm consistency, 20 to 30 minutes.', 'Stir sugar and salt into rice mixture. Off heat, slowly whisk in egg yolk mixture until completely incorporated and custard in color, about 1 minute. Whisk in vanilla extract.', 'Transfer rice pudding to a bowl  cool to room temperature, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until well-chilled, at least 3 hours. Garnish with mango and five-spice powder.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '361 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '40 g', 'Cholesterol': '73 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '9 g', 'Saturated Fat': '15 g', 'Sodium': '102 mg', 'Sugar': '22 g', 'Fat': '20 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Moist Flourless Chocolate Cupcakes
Author: SASS E Anne
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'semisweet chocolate chips', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'separated'}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1.5 cups semisweet chocolate chips', '6 tablespoons butter', '6 eggs, separated', '0.5 cup white sugar']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). Line two 12-cup muffin tins with paper liners.', 'Combine chocolate chips and butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat  cook and stir until melted and smooth, about 3 minutes. Cool slightly, about 5 minutes. Whisk in egg yolks.', 'Beat egg whites in a large bowl with an electric mixer until soft peaks form  gradually beat in sugar with the mixer running until peaks are stiff and glossy.', 'Stir some egg whites into chocolate mixture to lighten, then fold chocolate mixture into remaining egg whites until batter is well combined.', 'Scoop batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling each 3/4 full.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until cupcakes are just set in centers, about 25 minutes. Place muffin tins on wire racks to cool, about 5 minutes. Remove cupcakes from tins  place on wire racks to cool completely, about 15 minutes.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '110 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '11 g', 'Cholesterol': '54 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '2 g', 'Saturated Fat': '4 g', 'Sodium': '39 mg', 'Sugar': '10 g', 'Fat': '7 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Fresh Lemon Bundt Cake
Author: Handy Andy
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'softened'}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'lemon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'zested'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 cup butter, softened', '2 cups white sugar', '5 large eggs', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '0.25 cup fresh lemon juice', '1 large lemon, zested']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Grease and flour a fluted tube pan (such as a Bundt).', 'Beat butter and sugar with an electric mixer in a large bowl until light and fluffy. The mixture should be noticeably lighter in color. Name: 3-Ingredient Japanese Cheesecake
Author: anna77
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'white chocolate', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bar', 'misc': 'chopped 4 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'cream cheese', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'softened'}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'separated'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 (4 ounce) bar white chocolate, chopped', '0.5 cup cream cheese, softened', '3 eggs, separated']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan with parchment paper.', 'Place white chocolate in the top of a double boiler over simmering water. Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes. Remove and allow to cool slightly. Mix in cream cheese and egg yolks until well combined.', 'Beat egg whites in a large glass, metal, or ceramic bowl with an electric mixer until stiff peaks form. Fold in cooled white chocolate mixture. Pour into the prepared springform pan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C) and bake for 15 minutes. Turn the oven off, leaving cheesecake inside for 15 more minutes.', 'Remove cheesecake from the oven and allow to cool completely at room temperature, about 1 hour. Chill before serving, about 3 hours.']

Name: Tiramisu Cheesecake
Author: Marty Fries
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'ladyfingers', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '12 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'melted'}, {'ingredient': 'coffee-flavored liqueur', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cream cheese', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'softened 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'mascarpone cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'container', 'misc': 'softened 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'coffee-flavored liqueur', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'heavy cream', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'or more as needed'}, {'ingredient': 'semisweet chocolate', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'ounce', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 (12 ounce) package ladyfingers', '0.25 cup unsalted butter, melted', '2 tablespoons coffee-flavored liqueur', '3 (8 ounce) packages cream cheese, softened', '1 (8 ounce) container mascarpone cheese, softened', '1 cup white sugar', '2 tablespoons coffee-flavored liqueur', '0.25 cup all-purpose flour', '2 large eggs', '1 teaspoon heavy cream, or more as needed', '0.25 ounce semisweet chocolate']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Place a pan of water on the lowest oven rack.', 'To make the crust: Crush ladyfingers into fine crumbs. Place crumbs into a bowl with melted butter and coffee-flavored liqueur  stir until evenly combined. Press into the bottom of a 9-inch springform pan.', 'To make the filling: Beat cream cheese, mascarpone cheese, and sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer until very smooth, 2 to 3 minutes. Scrape down the sides of the bowl and mix in coffee-flavored liqueur. Add flour and eggs  mix on low speed just until smooth. If batter seems too thick, mix in heavy cream. Pour batter over the crust.', 'Bake on the center rack of the preheated oven until just set, 40 to 45 minutes.', 'Open the oven door, turn off the heat, and leave cheesecake to cool on the center rack for 20 minutes.', 'Remove from the oven, transfer to a wire rack to cool completely, about 30 more minutes.', 'Refrigerate for at least 3 hours, or overnight.', 'Just before serving, grate semisweet chocolate over the top.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '528 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '40 g', 'Cholesterol': '188 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '10 g', 'Saturated Fat': '21 g', 'Sodium': '256 mg', 'Sugar': '20 g', 'Fat': '36 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Instant Pot® Southwest Quinoa
Author: fabeveryday
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'oil nonstick cooking spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'olive', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'quinoa', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'rinsed well'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatoes green chiles', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '10 ounce such as rotel® diced with'}, {'ingredient': 'chicken broth', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'seasoned salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chili powder', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'garlic powder', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lime', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': 'juiced'}]

Instructions: ["Spray the inner pot of a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) with cooking spray. Add rinsed quinoa, diced tomatoes with green chiles with their juices, chicken broth, seasoned salt, chili powder, and garlic powder to the pot and stir gently. Close and lock the lid. Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions  set timer for 1 minute. Allow about 10 minutes for pressure to build.", "Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, about 10 minutes. Unlock and remove the lid.", 'Drizzle juice of 1 lime over quinoa, fluff with a fork, and serve.']

Name: Cracker Cookie Brittle
Author: Trish McQuhae
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'thin round wheat crackers original crackers', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': '', 'misc': '8 ounce such as dare breton®'}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'brown sugar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chocolate chips', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'walnuts', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1.5 (8 ounce) packages thin round wheat crackers (such as Dare Breton®) Original Crackers)', '1 cup butter', '1 cup brown sugar', '1 cup chocolate chips', '0.5 cup chopped walnuts']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty aluminum foil.', 'Place crackers on the foil-lined baking sheet in a single layer so they overlap like shingles. Add butter and sugar to a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil and continue to cook until sugar dissolves, about 3 minutes. Pour butter-sugar mixture evenly over crackers.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 15 minutes  remove from oven, and sprinkle with chocolate chips.', 'Let stand until chips have melted, about 2 minutes. Spread chocolate over crackers with a spreader or kitchen knife. Sprinkle with nuts.', 'Allow to cool completely, about 1 hour. Break into chunks, and store in an airtight, sealed container.']

Name: Banana Cake
Author: Cindy Carnes
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'mashed bananas', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking soda', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '2.125', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'buttermilk', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'softened'}, {'ingredient': 'cream cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'softened 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'confectioners sugar', 'quantity': '3.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1.5 cups mashed bananas', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '3 cups all-purpose flour', '1.5 teaspoons baking soda', '0.25 teaspoon salt', '2.125 cups white sugar', '0.75 cup butter', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1.5 cups buttermilk', '0.5 cup butter, softened', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, softened', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', "3.5 cups confectioners' sugar"]
Instructions: ['Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C). Grease and flour a 9x13-inch pan.', 'Make cake: Mix mashed bananas with lemon juice in a small bowl.', 'Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a medium bowl.', 'Cream sugar and butter in a large bowl until light and fluffy, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.', 'Beat in flour mixture alternately with buttermilk. Stir in banana mixture.', 'Pour batter into the prepared pan.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean, about 1 hour.', 'Remove cake from the oven and place it directly into the freezer for 45 minutes. This will make the cake very moist.', 'Meanwhile, make frosting: Cream butter and cream cheese until smooth. Beat in vanilla. Add confectioners sugar and beat on low speed until combined, then on high until frosting is smooth.', 'Spread frosting on cooled cake.', 'Serve and enjoy!']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '453 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '69 g', 'Cholesterol': '79 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '5 g', 'Saturated Fat': '11 g', 'Sodium': '299 mg', 'Sugar': '50 g', 'Fat': '18 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Baked Potato Salad
Author: chefheather
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'potatoes', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'pounds', 'misc': 'peeled'}, {'ingredient': 'bacon', 'quantity': '15', 'unit': 'slices', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'reduced-fat sour cream', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'container', 'misc': '16 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'cheddar cheese', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'mayonnaise', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chives', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['4 pounds potatoes, peeled', '15 slices bacon', '1 (16 ounce) container reduced-fat sour cream', '2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons dried chives', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper']
Instructions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Place potatoes into a large pot and cover with salted water  bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer until just tender, about 15 minutes. Drain and set aside.', 'Cook bacon in a large, deep skillet over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain on a paper towel-lined plate.', 'Dice cooled potatoes and place into a large bowl.', 'Add sour cream, Cheddar, mayonnaise, chives, salt, and pepper.', 'Crumble bacon into the bowl and mix until ingredients are well combined. Cover and refrigerate for 8 hours before serving.']
