Instructions: ['Place wood chips in a bowl  cover with several inches of cold water and let soak for at least 1 hour.', 'Preheat an outdoor charcoal grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate. Sprinkle wood chips over coals and close grill lid, leaving top vents open. When smoke rises from the vents, shut them, open the grill, and place fennel slices directly on the grates to create a bed.', "Generously season salmon fillets with salt and black pepper. Place salmon on top of fennel slices. Close the grill lid, leaving the vents shut. Cook until salmon is tender and starting to flake, 15 to 20 minutes. Remove from grill and let rest for 5 minutes. Scrape fennel from the grill and place atop salmon while it rests or discard it (see Editor's Note).", 'Combine tomatoes, olive oil, lemon juice, fennel fronds, sugar, salt, and black pepper in a bowl. Spoon tomato mixture over salmon and serve.']

Name: Chocolate Dipped Bing Cherries
Author: Barry
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cherries stems', 'quantity': '24', 'unit': 'bing', 'misc': 'with'}, {'ingredient': 'semisweet chocolate', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'chopped'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 cup white sugar', '1.5 teaspoons vanilla extract', '24 Bing cherries with stems', '8 ounces semisweet chocolate, chopped']
Instructions: ['Pour sugar into a shallow dish and spread evenly. Add 2 drops of vanilla at a time to the dish in 24 separate places to form lumps of vanilla sugar. Make sure the stem stays intact.', 'When lumps of sugar have hardened, insert them into cherries where the pits were  set aside.', 'Place chocolate in a microwave-safe dish and melt in the microwave until smooth, stirring every 30 seconds.', 'Hold cherries by the stem and dip into melted chocolate, leaving the very top uncovered. Set on waxed paper to dry, then place in the refrigerator to allow sugar lumps to dissolve, 8 hours to overnight.']

Name: Aloo Paratha
Author: Aavi1325
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'potatoes', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': 'peeled and cubed'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'divided or as needed'}, {'ingredient': 'cumin seeds', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chile peppers', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'green', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'curry leaves', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'fresh', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'ginger', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'minced fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'turmeric', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or to taste ground'}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'whole wheat flour', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'divided'}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1.25', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['3 medium potatoes, peeled and cubed', '4 teaspoons vegetable oil, divided, or as needed', '0.25 teaspoon cumin seeds', '2 green chile peppers, minced', '6 fresh curry leaves', '0.5 teaspoon minced fresh ginger', '1 pinch ground turmeric, or to taste', 'salt to taste', '5 cups whole wheat flour, divided', '1.25 cups water']
Instructions: ['Place a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill with water to just below the bottom of the steamer. Bring water to a boil. Add potatoes, cover, and steam until tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove from the heat.', 'Heat 1 1/2 teaspoons vegetable oil in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add cumin seeds and cook until light brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Add chile peppers, curry leaves, and ginger  cook and stir for about 1 minute. Add potatoes, turmeric, and salt  cook and stir carefully for about 5 minutes.', 'Transfer potatoes to a bowl and allow to cool, about 15 minutes.', 'Place 1/2 cup flour into a shallow bowl. Combine the remaining flour and 1 1/2 teaspoons oil in a large mixing bowl  salt to taste. Mix with your hands while gradually adding water. Knead dough until a smooth ball forms. Divide into 6 evenly round balls.', 'Roll each dough ball into a thick, circular shape. Form the cooled potato mixture into 6 round balls and place a potato ball on top of each dough circle. Fold all the dough sides over the potato filling to cover. Flatten each stuffed dough slightly while dipping both sides into the bowl of flour.', 'Roll each dough to a thin, circular shape and set a few inches apart on parchment paper.', 'Set a large skillet over medium heat and lightly spread with remaining oil. Place a stuffed paratha on the hot skillet and cook for 2 to 3 minutes. Flip over and cook the other side for 2 to 3 minutes. Remove to a serving plate and continue this same process for all the parathas. Serve hot.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '457 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '93 g', 'Cholesterol': '', 'Fiber': '15 g', 'Protein': '16 g', 'Saturated Fat': '1 g', 'Sodium': '14 mg', 'Sugar': '2 g', 'Fat': '5 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Instructions: ['Fill a stockpot with enough water to just cover the jars. Attach a sous vide immersion cooker to the side of the pot. Set temperature to 172 degrees F (77 degrees C).', 'Generously oil the inside of each jar with coconut oil. Name: Lita's Albondigas (Meatball Soup)
Author: avinamarie
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'beef', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatillos', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'husked and chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'beaten'}, {'ingredient': 'white rice', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'uncooked'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'peeled and crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'cumin', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'tomatoes', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'misc': 'peeled'}, {'ingredient': 'onions', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'white', 'misc': 'quartered'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatillos', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'husked and chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'chipotle peppers in adobo sauce', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': '7 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'peeled and crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chicken broth', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'quarts', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'carrots', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'peeled and chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'celery', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'stalks', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'cilantro', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'cumin', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'lemons', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'cut into wedges'}, {'ingredient': 'corn tortillas', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '12 ounce'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 pound ground beef', '0.25 pound tomatillos, husked and chopped', '2 eggs, beaten', '0.5 cup uncooked white rice', '3 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon salt', '2 pounds tomatoes, peeled', '3 white onions, quartered', '0.75 pound tomatillos, husked and chopped', '2 (7 ounce) cans chipotle peppers in adobo sauce', '3 cloves garlic, peeled and crushed', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '3 quarts chicken broth', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '3 large carrots, peeled and chopped', '3 stalks celery, chopped', '1 bunch cilantro, chopped', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '2 lemons, cut into wedges', '1 (12 ounce) package corn tortillas']
Instructions: ['Mix ground beef, 1/4 pound tomatillos, eggs, white rice, 3 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon cumin, and 1 teaspoon salt in a large bowl.', 'Scoop 1 1/2 tablespoon of the beef mixture and roll into a meatball. Repeat with remaining beef mixture.', 'Combine tomatoes, 1 onion, 3/4 pound tomatillos, chipotle peppers, and 3 cloves garlic in a blender  puree until smooth.', 'Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add tomato puree  cook and stir for 3 minutes. Pour in chicken broth. Season broth with salt and pepper. Bring to a slow boil  reduce heat until broth is barely bubbling.', 'Lower meatballs carefully into the hot broth  simmer gently for 20 minutes. Add remaining 2 onions, carrots, celery, cilantro, and 1 teaspoon cumin. Simmer until rice in the meatballs is cooked through, about 1 hour and 15 minutes.', 'Squeeze some lemon juice into each bowl. Serve with corn tortillas.']

Name: Brioche Bread Pudding
Author: Renate
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'brioche bread', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'loaf', 'misc': 'cut into 34-inch cubes 1 pound'}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.125', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'heavy whipping cream', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'half-and-half', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'dark brown sugar', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'rum', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon juice', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'bananas', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ripe', 'misc': 'sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'foil', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'aluminum', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'powdered sugar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'heavy whipping cream', 'quantity': '1.25', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'dark rum', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['cooking spray', '1 (1 pound) loaf brioche bread, cut into 3/4-inch cubes', '6 large eggs', '0.75 cup white sugar', '0.125 teaspoon salt', '1.5 cups heavy whipping cream', '1.5 cups half-and-half', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '0.25 cup dark brown sugar', '3 tablespoons unsalted butter', '0.25 cup rum', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '0.25 teaspoon salt', '4 ripe bananas, sliced', 'aluminum foil', '2 cups powdered sugar', '1.25 cups heavy whipping cream', '0.25 cup dark rum', '0.25 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon unsalted butter']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a 9x12-inch glass baking dish with cooking spray.', 'Spread bread cubes on an ungreased baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven, stirring once or twice, until toasted, 5 to 7 minutes. Remove from the oven and set aside.', 'Whisk eggs, sugar, and 1/8 teaspoon salt together in a large bowl until blended.', 'Bring cream and half-and-half to a simmer in a medium saucepan. Remove from heat. Pour some of the hot cream mixture into the egg mixture, whisking quickly to avoid scrambling the eggs. Continue adding cream mixture slowly and whisking until all has been added. Whisk in vanilla extract and set custard aside to cool.', 'Combine brown sugar and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat  whisk until butter is melted and mixture is smooth. Whisk in rum, lemon juice, and 1/4 teaspoon salt. Add bananas and toss just until coated. Remove from heat.', 'Toss 1/3 of the toasted bread in the prepared baking dish and top with 1/2 of the banana-syrup mixture. Layer with 1/2 of the remaining bread, the remaining banana-syrup mixture, and the remaining bread. Pour custard over the top and allow pudding to stand for 30 minutes, pressing down on the bread occasionally so it absorbs the custard.', 'Cover bread pudding with aluminum foil and place the baking dish inside a large baking pan. Fill the large pan with warm water so it reaches halfway up the sides of the pudding dish.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake until pudding has puffed up and the center is set, about 45 minutes longer. Remove from the water bath and let stand for 15 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, pour powdered sugar evenly into a heavy saucepan. Cook, without stirring, over medium-high heat until sugar begins to melt and caramelize on the bottom, 3 to 4 minutes. Stir until all sugar is melted and smooth. Add 1 cup cream, rum, and salt  stir until smooth. Stir in remaining 1/4 cup cream. Remove from heat and stir in butter until caramel sauce is smooth. Serve with bread pudding.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '475 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '51 g', 'Cholesterol': '168 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '7 g', 'Saturated Fat': '14 g', 'Sodium': '259 mg', 'Sugar': '34 g', 'Fat': '26 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Pasta with Asparagus and Lemon Sauce
Author: barbara
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'lemons', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'penne pasta', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'box', 'misc': '16 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'divided'}, {'ingredient': 'asparagus', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'freshly ground'}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'heavy cream', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable broth', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'or more to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'parsley', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'sprigs', 'misc': 'chopped fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatoes', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ripe', 'misc': 'seeded and diced'}, {'ingredient': 'shaved parmesan cheese', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'freshly'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 lemons', '1 (16 ounce) box penne pasta', '5 tablespoons butter, divided', '0.75 pound asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '0.75 cup heavy cream', '1.5 cups vegetable broth, or more to taste', '4 sprigs fresh parsley, chopped', '1 pinch white sugar, or to taste', '2 ripe tomatoes, seeded and diced', '0.5 cup freshly shaved Parmesan cheese']
Instructions: ['Zest and juice 1 1/2 lemons. Cut remaining lemon half into wedges and set aside.', 'Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add penne and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup of cooking water.', 'While penne is cooking, melt 2 tablespoons butter in a pot over medium heat and cook asparagus until softened, 4 to 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper and remove from pot.', 'Add remaining 3 tablespoons butter and heat until a pinch of flour sprinkled into the pot will just begin to bubble. Whisk in flour to form a thick paste the consistency of cake frosting. Continue cooking, whisking constantly, for about 5 minutes. Whisk in cream and vegetable broth and bring to a simmer. Simmer for 1 to 2 minutes.', 'Stir lemon juice, lemon zest, and parsley into the sauce  season with salt, pepper, and sugar. Add asparagus and heat through, about 2 minutes. Add tomatoes and penne to the sauce and pour in some of the reserved cooking water. Serve with shaved Parmesan and lemon wedges.']

Name: Chicken and Rice Soup I
Author: Nell Marsh
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'celery', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'finely diced'}, {'ingredient': 'white rice', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'uncooked'}, {'ingredient': 'chicken bouillon', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cubes', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '2.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'melted'}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': '', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'boiled chicken chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'ground', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['0.75 cup chopped celery', '0.75 cup finely diced onion', '1 cup uncooked white rice', '2 cubes chicken bouillon', '2.5 cups water', '0.5 cup butter, melted', '4 tablespoons all-purpose flour', '2 cups milk', '1.5 cups chopped, boiled chicken', '1 cup milk', 'ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Cook celery, onion, rice, bouillon, and water about 20 minutes or until most of the water is absorbed by the rice. Remove from the heat.', 'Make a cream base: Combine butter and flour in a small skillet, making a paste. Add 2 cups milk and stir to make a smooth sauce.', 'Add cream base to the rice mixture. Add chicken and 1 cup milk. If the soup seems thick, add more milk. Add pepper to taste and serve hot.']

Name: Farm-Fresh Poached Eggs
Author: thedailygourmet
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'egg', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'whole raw fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'freshly ground'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['4 cups water', '2 large Egg, whole, raw, fresh', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Fill a wide pan with 4 cups water (about 3 inches deep) and bring to a boil over high heat. Once the water boils, turn the heat down to just below a simmer (there should be no bubbles).', 'Crack eggs open into a ramekin. Transfer eggs into a soup ladle, and working quickly and gently, angle your soup ladle so the eggs slip into the water.', 'Set a timer for 3 minutes. After 3 minutes, use a slotted spoon to lift your eggs from the water, one at a time. Give each a little jiggle to check that the whites are set. If not, dip back in for 30 seconds more. Remove and serve immediately with salt and pepper. Your yolk should run when pierced with a fork.']

Name: Egg Salad with a Kick
Author: rowdy
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'fat-free mayonnaise', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'light sour cream', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chinese mustard', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'hot prepared'}, {'ingredient': 'celery', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'stalk', 'misc': 'finely chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'green olives', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'pimento-stuffed', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'sweet pickle relish', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'paprika', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'red pepper flakes', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['3 eggs', '0.25 cup fat-free mayonnaise', '0.25 cup light sour cream', '1.5 teaspoons Chinese hot prepared mustard', '1 stalk celery, finely chopped', '5 pimento-stuffed green olives, chopped', '1 tablespoon sweet pickle relish', '0.25 teaspoon paprika', '1 pinch red pepper flakes', 'salt and pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Place eggs in a saucepan and cover with cold water. Bring water to a boil and immediately remove from heat. Cover and let eggs stand in hot water for 15minutes. Drain hot water, and run eggs under cold water to chill. Crack shells by rolling on the counter, and peel.', 'Place eggs in the container of a food processor, and briefly pulse to chop. Transfer the eggs to a medium bowl, and stir in the mayonnaise, sour cream, Chinese mustard, celery, olives, and relish. Season with paprika, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Taste, and adjust seasoning to your liking.']

Name: Creamy Chicken Soup with Fennel and Mushrooms
Author: christyH
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'avocado oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'skinless', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'boneless chicken breast halves 5 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'sweet vermouth', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'fennel', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bulb', 'misc': 'cored and thinly sliced crosswise'}, {'ingredient': 'parsley', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'chopped fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'lemon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': 'juiced'}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'chicken bone broth', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baby bella mushrooms', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'buttermilk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'heavy cream', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'red pepper flakes', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or more to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'himalayan', 'misc': 'ground'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 tablespoon avocado oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '2 (5 ounce) skinless, boneless chicken breast halves', '0.33333334326744 cup sweet vermouth', '1 bulb fennel, cored and thinly sliced crosswise', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 medium lemon, juiced', '0.5 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 cups chicken bone broth', '1.5 cups baby bella mushrooms, sliced', '1 cup buttermilk', '0.33333334326744 cup heavy cream', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or more to taste', 'Himalayan salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Heat oil and butter in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add chicken and sear until browned, about 3 minutes per side. Reduce heat to medium. Pour vermouth into the pan and bring to a boil while scraping the browned bits of food off the bottom of the pan with a wooden spoon.', 'Add fennel  cook and stir for 3 minutes. Add parsley, lemon juice, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Simmer, stirring frequently, until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear, 5 to 10 more minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C). Remove chicken to a plate to cool.', 'Add broth, mushrooms, buttermilk, heavy cream, red pepper flakes, salt, and pepper to the Dutch oven. Bring to a simmer. Keep hot, but do not boil.', 'When chicken is cooled, tear into pieces and return to the pot. Cook until heated through, 2 to 3 minutes. Serve immediately.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '303 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '16 g', 'Cholesterol': '80 mg', 'Fiber': '4 g', 'Protein': '20 g', 'Saturated Fat': '8 g', 'Sodium': '746 mg', 'Sugar': '6 g', 'Fat': '17 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Awesome Carrot Muffins
Author: Mechelle
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'raisins', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking powder', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking soda', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'brown sugar', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'carrots', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'shredded'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 cup raisins', '2 cups all-purpose flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons baking soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 cup vegetable oil', '0.75 cup brown sugar', '4 large eggs', '3 cups shredded carrots']
Instructions: ['Gather all ingredients.', 'Soak raisins in 2 cups water in a small bowl for 15 minutes. Drain and set aside.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 18 standard muffin cups with paper liners.', 'Sift flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, and cinnamon together in a bowl.', 'Beat oil, brown sugar, and eggs in a large bowl with an electric mixer until well combined.', 'Gradually mix in flour mixture, then fold in carrots and drained raisins.', 'Spoon batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling each 2/3 full.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until tops spring back when lightly pressed, 20 to 30 minutes.', 'Cool in the tins for 5 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '223 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '24 g', 'Cholesterol': '41 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '3 g', 'Saturated Fat': '2 g', 'Sodium': '396 mg', 'Sugar': '7 g', 'Fat': '13 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Creamy Bang Bang Shrimp Pasta
Author: Bibi
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'fettuccine pasta', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': '', 'misc': '16 ounce dry'}, {'ingredient': 'mayonnaise', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'thai sweet chili sauce', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'heavy cream', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'sriracha sauce', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'smoked paprika', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'shrimp', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'peeled and deveined uncooked medium'}, {'ingredient': 'white wine', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'dry'}, {'ingredient': 'lime', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'juiced'}, {'ingredient': 'red pepper flakes', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or to taste'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['0.5 (16 ounce) package dry fettuccine pasta', '0.25 cup mayonnaise', '0.25 cup Thai sweet chili sauce', '2 tablespoons heavy cream', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '2 teaspoons Sriracha sauce', '1 teaspoon smoked paprika', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon butter', '0.5 pound uncooked medium shrimp, peeled and deveined', '0.25 cup dry white wine', '0.5 lime, juiced', '1 pinch red pepper flakes, or to taste']
Instructions: ['Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Cook fettuccine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes.', 'While pasta is cooking, whisk mayonnaise, chili sauce, cream, garlic, Sriracha sauce, paprika, salt, and pepper in a medium bowl.', 'Melt butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Add shrimp, wine, and lime juice. Cook and stir until shrimp begin to change color, 3 to 4 minutes.', 'Drain fettuccine  add up to 2 tablespoons of pasta water to the shrimp. Stir in the mayonnaise mixture and red pepper flakes. Add the cooked fettuccine  stir to coat with sauce. Divide pasta between serving bowls.']

Name: Vegan Stuffed Peppers with Rice
Author: Emily
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'bell peppers', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'red', 'misc': 'tops and seeds removed'}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegan ground beef', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'frozen such as beyond meat®'}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatoes', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable broth', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'divided 14 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic powder', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chili powder', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'spanish rice mix', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'black beans', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'rinsed and drained'}, {'ingredient': 'corn', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'drained'}, {'ingredient': 'nutritional yeast', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'tomato sauce', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['4 red bell peppers, tops and seeds removed', 'salt to taste', '1 cup vegan "ground beef," frozen (such as Beyond Meat®)', '1 cup diced onion', '1 cup diced tomatoes', '1 (14 ounce) can vegetable broth, divided', '1 teaspoon garlic powder', '1 teaspoon chili powder', '0.5 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 cup water', '1 (8 ounce) package Spanish rice mix', '1 cup black beans, rinsed and drained', '1 cup corn, drained', '1 tablespoon nutritional yeast', '4 ounces tomato sauce']
Instructions: ['Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Add bell peppers and cook until soft, 8 to 10 minutes. Drain and sprinkle insides with salt. Set aside for 10 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking dish with aluminum foil.', 'Combine vegan ground beef, onion, diced tomatoes, 2/3 cup broth, garlic powder, chili powder, black pepper, and salt in a large skillet over medium-high heat and bring to a high simmer. Cook, stirring occasionally, until all but 1/3 cup of liquid has steamed off or been absorbed, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat.', 'Combine water, 1 cup broth, and Spanish rice package in a saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer, and cook for 8 minutes. Add black beans and corn  stir to combine. Add "ground beef" mixture with enough liquid to keep rice stuffing moist. Mix in nutritional yeast and stir until well combined.', 'Drain any excess water from peppers. Stuff with rice mixture using a spoon, packing filling down tightly. Place stuffed peppers in the prepared baking pan and spoon extra rice mixture around them. Pour tomato sauce over peppers and rice. Cover with aluminum foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes. Remove foil and bake uncovered for an additional 10 minutes. Let peppers sit for 5 minutes before serving.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '295 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '52 g', 'Cholesterol': '', 'Fiber': '12 g', 'Protein': '19 g', 'Saturated Fat': '0 g', 'Sodium': '1116 mg', 'Sugar': '12 g', 'Fat': '3 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Baked Asparagus with Cheesy Onion Topping
Author: corvettecruzer
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'asparagus', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'misc': 'fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'onion soup mix', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': '', 'misc': '1 ounce dry'}, {'ingredient': 'mozzarella cheese', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'shredded'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['cooking spray', '1 bunch fresh asparagus', '2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste', '0.5 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix', '0.5 cup shredded mozzarella cheese']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly coat a large baking sheet with cooking spray.', 'Snip the white ends off of the asparagus so that all of the stalks are roughly the same length. Lay the stalks on a baking sheet so that they are all touching.', 'Drizzle asparagus stalks with olive oil. Shake the onion soup mix packet to mix up any settled ingredients  sprinkle over asparagus.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until softened and lightly browned, 25 to 35 minutes.', 'Remove from oven  sprinkle mozzarella cheese on top of the asparagus. Continue baking until cheese is melted and starting to brown, about 5 minutes more.']

Name: Braised Lamb Shanks with Butternut Squash Puree
Author: Cindy Anschutz Barbieri
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'melted butter', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'divided'}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'shanks', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'lamb', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'sea', 'misc': 'divided'}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'freshly ground'}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'carrots', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'celery', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'stalks', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'thyme', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': 'divided dried'}, {'ingredient': 'rosemary', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': 'divided dried'}, {'ingredient': 'basil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'chicken broth', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'or more as needed'}, {'ingredient': 'red wine', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'or more as needed'}, {'ingredient': 'squash', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'butternut', 'misc': 'peeled and chopped 2 12 pound'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['0.25 cup melted butter, divided', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 lamb shanks', 'sea salt, divided', '1.5 teaspoons freshly ground black pepper', '1 large onion, chopped', '3 carrots, chopped', '2 stalks celery, chopped', '6 cloves garlic, minced', '1 tablespoon dried thyme, divided', '1.5 teaspoons dried rosemary, divided', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '3 cups chicken broth, or more as needed', '1 cup red wine, or more as needed', '1 (2 1/2 pound) butternut squash, peeled and chopped']
Instructions: ['Preheat oven to 275 degrees F (135 degrees C).', 'Heat 2 tablespoons butter and olive oil in a large oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Season lamb shanks with 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon pepper. Cook until browned, about 2 minutes per side.', 'Stir onion, carrots, and celery into the pan. Add 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, garlic, 2 teaspoons thyme, 1 teaspoon rosemary, and basil. Pour in chicken broth and wine  bring to a boil. Remove from heat and cover.', 'Place covered pan in the preheated oven  bake until lamb shanks are tender, about 6 hours. Check level of liquid every 2 hours, adding more chicken broth or red wine if too much evaporates.', 'Place butternut squash in a large pot of water with 1 teaspoon salt  bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain and return to the pot.', 'Stir 2 tablespoons butter, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1 teaspoon thyme, 1/2 teaspoon rosemary. Mash with a fork until smooth. Reheat over medium heat before serving with lamb shanks.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '620 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '48 g', 'Cholesterol': '124 mg', 'Fiber': '9 g', 'Protein': '32 g', 'Saturated Fat': '13 g', 'Sodium': '2177 mg', 'Sugar': '12 g', 'Fat': '31 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Eggs Benedict Casserole
Author: alycimo
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'green onions', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'stalks', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'onion powder', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'canadian bacon', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'cut into 12-inch dice'}, {'ingredient': 'muffins', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'english', 'misc': 'cut into 12-inch dice'}, {'ingredient': 'paprika', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'milk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'hollandaise sauce mix', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '9 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'margarine', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['cooking spray', '2 cups milk', '8 large eggs', '3 stalks green onions, chopped', '1 teaspoon onion powder', '1 teaspoon salt', '0.75 pound Canadian bacon, cut into 1/2-inch dice', '6 English muffins, cut into 1/2-inch dice', '0.5 teaspoon ground paprika', '1 cup milk', '1 (.9 ounce) package Hollandaise sauce mix', '0.25 cup margarine']
Instructions: ['Gather the ingredients. Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.', 'To prepare the casserole: Whisk milk, eggs, green onions, onion powder, and salt together in a large bowl until well combined. Set aside.', 'Layer 1/2 of the Canadian bacon in the prepared baking dish  cover with English muffins.', 'Top with remaining Canadian bacon and pour egg mixture over everything. Cover the baking dish with plastic wrap and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.', 'Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Remove plastic wrap and sprinkle casserole with paprika  cover the baking dish with aluminum foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until eggs are nearly set, about 30 minutes. Remove the foil and continue baking until eggs are completely set, about 15 minutes more.', 'Meanwhile, make the sauce: Whisk 1 cup milk and Hollandaise sauce mix in a saucepan over medium heat. Add butter  cook, stirring frequently, until boiling. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, stirring constantly, until thickened, about 1 minute.', 'To serve: Slice casserole into 10 pieces  transfer each piece onto a plate and drizzle warm sauce on top.', 'Enjoy!']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '281 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '21 g', 'Cholesterol': '174 mg', 'Fiber': '0 g', 'Protein': '18 g', 'Saturated Fat': '5 g', 'Sodium': '1053 mg', 'Sugar': '4 g', 'Fat': '14 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Chocolaty Oatmeal Brownies
Author: Christy Parker
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'cooking', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsweetened chocolate', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'squares', 'misc': '1 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'semisweet chocolate chips', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'walnuts', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'oats', 'quantity': '0.66666668653488', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['cooking spray', '1 cup butter', '4 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate', '2 cups white sugar', '4 large eggs', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 pinch salt', '1 cup semisweet chocolate chips', '1 cup chopped walnuts', '0.66666668653488 cup oats']
Instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a 9x13-inch baking dish with cooking spray.', 'Melt butter and unsweetened chocolate together in the top of a double boiler over simmering water, stirring frequently and scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching. Remove from heat and pour chocolate mixture into a bowl.', 'Mix sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract into chocolate mixture using a fork. Stir flour and salt into chocolate mixture until batter is smooth  fold in chocolate chips, walnuts, and oats. Pour batter into the prepared baking dish.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until brownies are beginning to pull away from sides and middle is done, 25 to 30 minutes. Cool before cutting.']

Name: Shahi Tukray (Indian Bread Pudding)
Author: Tooba1980
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'half-and-half', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sweetened condensed milk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '14 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'bread', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'loaf', 'misc': 'crusts removed divided sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'for frying', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'oil', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 quart half-and-half', '2 cups white sugar', '1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk', '1 loaf sliced bread, crusts removed, divided', 'oil for frying']
Instructions: ['Combine half-and-half, sugar, and condensed milk in a large pot over medium-low heat. Bring to a gentle boil  simmer until reduced by half, about 55 minutes.', 'Dissolve 2 slices of bread in the half-and-half mixture  blend mixture with an immersion blender until thickened.', 'Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).', 'Heat oil in a deep-fryer or large saucepan. Fry remaining bread slices in batches until golden brown, about 1 minute per side. Drain on paper towels.', 'Slice bread diagonally  layer slices in a 9x12-inch baking dish. Pour in enough of the half-and-half mixture to evenly soak the slices.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until bubbly, about 20 minutes. Flip bread slices and continue baking, about 5 minutes.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '707 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '111 g', 'Cholesterol': '61 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '12 g', 'Saturated Fat': '12 g', 'Sodium': '498 mg', 'Sugar': '79 g', 'Fat': '26 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Green Rice III
Author: Kimber
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'green onions', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'bunches', 'misc': 'sliced white parts and tops separated'}, {'ingredient': 'peppers', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'jalapeno', 'misc': 'seeded and minced'}, {'ingredient': 'sherry', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'long-grain rice', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'uncooked'}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'chicken broth', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cilantro', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'parsley', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'minced'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 bunches green onions, sliced, white parts and tops separated', '2 jalapeno peppers, seeded and minced', '2 tablespoons sherry', '2 cups uncooked long-grain rice', 'salt to taste', '1 teaspoon black pepper', '2 cups chicken broth', '1.5 cups water', '0.5 cup minced cilantro', '0.5 cup minced parsley']
Instructions: ['Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute the white parts of the green onions with the jalapenos for 5 minutes  do not brown.', 'Stir in the sherry, rice, salt and pepper. Pour in the broth and water  bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat to low, and cook until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes.', 'Fluff with a fork and stir in cilantro, parsley and tops of green onions. Transfer to a warm serving dish and serve immediately.']

Name: Tomato Freekeh
Author: Nesreen
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'freekeh', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable broth', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'tomato paste', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'paprika', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cumin', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'turmeric', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}]

Name: Sarah's Roasted Red Pepper Dip
Author: sarah with an "h"
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'red bell peppers', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'tomato paste', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'mayonnaise', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sour cream', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vinegar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cayenne pepper', 'quantity': '0.125', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 large red bell peppers', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon sour cream', '2 teaspoons vinegar', '1 clove garlic', '0.125 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'salt to taste']
Instructions: ['Preheat oven to broil.', 'Place the bell peppers on a baking sheet and broil on the top rack of the oven, using tongs to turn them as each side blackens. Place the blackened peppers in a plastic bag, tied loosely with some air inside, for 15 minutes. Remove the stems and peel the peppers. Discard the cores and seeds. Cut peppers into wide strips.', 'Add the peppers, tomato paste, mayonnaise, sour cream, vinegar, garlic, and cayenne pepper in the bowl of a food processor. Pulse until almost smooth, 7 or 8 times. Salt to taste, if needed.', 'Refrigerate until ready to serve.']

Name: Linguine Pescadoro
Author: Donna
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'linguini pasta', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '16 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'italian seasoning', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'thyme', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'red pepper flakes', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatoes', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '28 ounce crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'black olives', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'drained 6 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'can whole baby clams', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '10 ounce 10 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'clams', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'with juice 65 ounce minced'}, {'ingredient': 'salad shrimp', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'small'}, {'ingredient': 'scallops', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon zest', 'quantity': '2.5', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'ground', 'misc': ''}]

Instructions: ['In a large pot of boiling salted water cook linguini until al dente. Drain.', 'Meanwhile, in a heavy saucepan over medium heat saute garlic in olive oil until garlic softens. Mix in canned clams, shrimp, scallops, lemon zest, and salt and pepper to taste. Name: Simple Carrot Cake Cupcakes with Cream Cheese Frosting
Author: eatcakebemerry
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'unsweetened applesauce', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'at room temperature'}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'baking soda', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baking powder', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'carrots', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': 'freshly grated'}, {'ingredient': 'raisins', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sweetened coconut', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'pineapple', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'drained crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'pecans', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'cream cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'at room temperature 8 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'unsalted butter', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'at room temperature'}, {'ingredient': 'powdered sugar', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vanilla extract', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'marshmallows', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'mini', 'misc': 'colored sanding sugar pearl sprinkles andor mini chocolate candies as needed'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['1 cup white sugar', '4 ounces unsweetened applesauce', '0.5 cup vegetable oil', '2 large eggs, at room temperature', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 cup all-purpose flour', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon baking soda', '0.5 teaspoon baking powder', '0.25 teaspoon salt', '1.5 cups freshly grated carrots', '0.25 cup raisins', '0.25 cup shredded sweetened coconut', '0.25 cup crushed pineapple, drained', '0.25 cup chopped pecans', '1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese, at room temperature', '0.5 cup unsalted butter, at room temperature', '4 cups powdered sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'mini marshmallows, colored sanding sugar, pearl sprinkles, and/or mini chocolate candies as needed']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 18 muffin cups with paper liners.', 'Whisk together sugar, applesauce, oil, eggs, and vanilla for cupcakes in a large bowl. Sift in flour, cinnamon, baking soda, baking powder, and salt  mix until well combined. Add grated carrots, raisins, shredded coconut, crushed pineapple, and pecans  mix until fully incorporated. Scoop batter into the prepared muffin cups, filling halfway.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the centers comes out clean, about 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely, about 30 minutes.', 'Meanwhile, beat cream cheese and butter for frosting with an electric mixer until smooth. Gradually mix in powdered sugar and beat until creamy. Mix in vanilla.', 'Frost cupcakes when they are completely cool  if they are even slightly warm, the frosting will melt. Decorate as desired.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '337 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '46 g', 'Cholesterol': '48 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '3 g', 'Saturated Fat': '7 g', 'Sodium': '163 mg', 'Sugar': '', 'Fat': '16 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Poached Pears with Wine Vinaigrette
Author: PS2XWIZ
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'bosc pears', 'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': 'peeled with stems intact'}, {'ingredient': 'white wine', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'water', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sugar', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'bean', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'vanilla', 'misc': 'halved lengthwise'}, {'ingredient': 'star anise pods', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'whole', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon stick', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'lemon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'zested'}, {'ingredient': 'orange', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'zested'}, {'ingredient': 'walnut oil', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'red wine vinegar', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'freshly ground'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['6 medium Bosc pears, peeled with stems intact', '1 cup white wine', '2 cups water', '2 tablespoons sugar', '0.5 vanilla bean, halved lengthwise', '2 whole star anise pods', '1 small cinnamon stick', '1 lemon, zested', '1 orange, zested', '0.25 cup walnut oil', '0.25 cup red wine vinegar', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Trim flat the bottoms of pears, and stand them upright in the bottom of a large stock pot. Pour the wine and water into the pot, and turn the flame to high heat. Sprinkle with sugar, and add vanilla bean, star anise, cinnamon stick, and lemon and orange peels. Bring to a boil  reduce heat to medium low, and simmer 20 to 25 minutes. Remove pot from stove, and let cool completely. Reserve 1/4 cup poaching liquid. Transfer pears to a bowl, cover, and refrigerate.', 'Place 2 poached pears in a blender or food processor, and puree. Remove to a large bowl. Whisk in walnut oil, red wine vinegar, and reserved poaching liquid. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cover, and refrigerate.', 'Place pears in individual bowls, and top with sauce.']

Name: Red, White, and Blue Taco Bites
Author: fabeveryday
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'cooking spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'nonstick', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'beef', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'taco seasoning mix', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '125 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'blue corn tortilla chips', 'quantity': '35', 'unit': 'round', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'monterey jack cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'divided shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'red salsa', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sour cream', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'divided'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['nonstick cooking spray', '1 pound ground beef', '1 (1.25 ounce) package taco seasoning mix', '35 round blue corn tortilla chips', '1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese, divided', '1 cup red salsa', '0.5 cup sour cream, divided']
Instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with foil and spray with nonstick spray.', 'Cook and stir ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned and crumbly, about 8 minutes. Drain excess oil from the skillet. Stir in taco seasoning until well mixed. Cook for an additional 2 minutes, then remove beef mixture to a paper towel-lined plate to soak up any excess moisture.', "Spread tortilla chips in a single layer onto the prepared baking sheet, making sure they don't overlap (you may need to use two baking sheets.) Top each chip with a small amount of cheese, a spoonful of the beef mixture, some salsa, followed by a little sour cream. Finally, sprinkle remaining cheese over the top of each chip, being careful to keep the cheese on the chip so when it melts it doesn't stick to the baking sheet.", 'Bake in the pre-heated oven for 5 minutes, or until the cheese has melted.', 'Pipe or dollop a small amount of the remaining sour cream on the very top of each taco bite. Serve on a platter.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '328 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '15 g', 'Cholesterol': '71 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '19 g', 'Saturated Fat': '10 g', 'Sodium': '878 mg', 'Sugar': '2 g', 'Fat': '21 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Three-Cheese Baked Ziti with Italian Sausage
Author: Doug in Manhattan
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'cooking spray', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'nonstick', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'mozzarella cheese', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '8 ounce shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'italian cheese blend', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '8 ounce shredded'}, {'ingredient': 'ziti pasta', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': '16 ounce'}, {'ingredient': 'olive oil', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or more to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'italian sausage', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'bulk'}, {'ingredient': 'baking soda', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'lower-sodium pasta sauce', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black olives', 'quantity': '0.33333334326744', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'whole fennel seeds', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'italian seasoning', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'anchovy paste', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'red pepper flakes', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'parmesan cheese', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'grated'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['nonstick cooking spray', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded mozzarella cheese', '1 (8 ounce) package shredded Italian cheese blend', '1 (16 ounce) package ziti pasta', '3 tablespoons olive oil, or more to taste', '1 pound bulk Italian sausage', '0.25 teaspoon baking soda', '1 cup diced onion', '3 cloves garlic, diced', '5 cups lower-sodium pasta sauce', '0.33333334326744 cup sliced black olives', '1 tablespoon whole fennel seeds', '2 teaspoons Italian seasoning', '1 teaspoon anchovy paste', '0.5 teaspoon ground black pepper', '0.25 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
Instructions: ['Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray a 4-quart rectangular baking dish with nonstick spray. Combine mozzarella and Italian blend cheeses in a bowl and place in the refrigerator.', 'Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add ziti and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 11 minutes. Drain.', 'At the same time, heat 3 tablespoons oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add sausage and break up into morsels. Sprinkle baking soda onto sausage, then add onion and garlic. Cook and stir, continuing to break up any clumps as it cooks, until browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes. Pour off and discard any grease.', 'Add pasta sauce, olives, fennel seeds, Italian seasoning, anchovy paste, black pepper, and red pepper flakes. Add up to 3 tablespoons more oil if desired, and continue stirring until mixture comes to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring regularly, until thickened, 5 to 10 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in ziti.', "Spread 1/2 of the sauced ziti into the prepared baking dish and sprinkle 1/2 of the shredded cheese mixture evenly on top. Spoon or ladle the rest of the ziti evenly on top without disturbing the layers underneath  it's okay to have some ziti partially exposed as they will brown handsomely and deliciously as they bake. Sprinkle remaining shredded cheese mixture on top and sprinkle Parmesan across the surface.", 'Bake, uncovered, in the preheated oven until bubbly, 20 to 25 minutes. Remove from the oven and let rest for 15 minutes before serving.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '480 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '47 g', 'Cholesterol': '44 mg', 'Fiber': '5 g', 'Protein': '21 g', 'Saturated Fat': '9 g', 'Sodium': '1145 mg', 'Sugar': '11 g', 'Fat': '23 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Author: Sean Clark

Ingredients_Raw: ['3 slices lemon', '8 large mint leaves', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 fluid ounce cold brew coffee', '4 cubes ice, or to taste', 'soda water']
Instructions: ['Cut lemon slices in half and tear mint leaves into thirds. Crush lemon, mint, and sugar together in a cup until sugar is completely wet. Pour cold brew on top. Mix well until sugar is dissolved. Add ice cubes and top with soda water. Stir well.']

Name: Fall Squash Soup
Author: Connor Lawson
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'stalk', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'celery', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'carrot', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'misc': 'minced'}, {'ingredient': 'chicken stock', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'squash', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'butternut', 'misc': 'peeled and cubed'}, {'ingredient': 'turnip', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'misc': 'peeled and diced'}, {'ingredient': 'sweet potato', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'misc': 'peeled and cubed'}, {'ingredient': 'cinnamon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or to taste ground'}, {'ingredient': 'nutmeg', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'misc': 'or to taste ground'}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['3 tablespoons butter', '1 onion, diced', '1 celery stalk, diced', '1 carrot, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '4 cups chicken stock', '1 butternut squash, peeled and cubed', '1 small turnip, peeled and diced', '1 small sweet potato, peeled and cubed', '1 pinch ground cinnamon, or to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg, or to taste', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Melt butter in a large soup pot over medium heat until just bubbling and beginning to smell nutty, 1 to 3 minutes. Add onion, celery, and carrot  cook until onion is soft and translucent, another 3 to 5 minutes. Add garlic directly to the bottom of the pot and cook for about 1 minute before stirring  be careful to prevent burning. Add chicken stock, butternut squash, turnip, and sweet potato and bring to a boil. Cover pot and simmer soup until sweet potato is fork tender, about 40 minutes.', 'Puree soup using a stick blender to desired consistency. Season to taste with cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and black pepper.']

Name: Warm Chicken, Bacon, and Egg Salad with Mayonnaise Dressing
Author: holliek8
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'smoked bacon', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'slices', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'eggs', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'skinless', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'boneless chicken breast halves cubed'}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'white', 'misc': 'sliced'}, {'ingredient': 'mushrooms', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'sliced fresh'}, {'ingredient': 'torn iceberg lettuce', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'bell pepper', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'red', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'tomatoes', 'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'cherry', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white cheddar cheese', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'cut into 12-inch cubes'}, {'ingredient': 'mayonnaise', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'ground'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 slices smoked bacon', '2 large eggs', '2 teaspoons vegetable oil', '2 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cubed', '1 white onion, sliced', '0.75 cup sliced fresh mushrooms', '3 cups torn iceberg lettuce', '0.5 red bell pepper, diced', '10 cherry tomatoes', '2 ounces white Cheddar cheese, cut into 1/2-inch cubes', '0.25 cup mayonnaise', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Place the bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes. Drain the bacon slices on paper towels. Chop bacon when cool enough to handle.', 'Bring a saucepan of water to a boil, reduce heat to medium, and gently lower eggs into the boiling water using a spoon. Boil for 8 minutes. Remove immediately from heat, drain, and cover eggs with cold water.', 'Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat  cook and stir chicken cubes, onion, and mushrooms in the hot oil until the meat is no longer pink inside and mushrooms are softened, about 10 minutes.', 'Place iceberg lettuce into a salad bowl. Add chicken-mushroom mixture and bacon. Top with red bell pepper, cherry tomatoes, and white Cheddar cheese. Stir mayonnaise into salad, tossing gently to coat. Peel eggs and cut each egg in half  cut halves horizontally into 3 wedges apiece. Arrange eggs on top of salad  serve warm.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '658 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '16 g', 'Cholesterol': '297 mg', 'Fiber': '4 g', 'Protein': '43 g', 'Saturated Fat': '14 g', 'Sodium': '758 mg', 'Sugar': '6 g', 'Fat': '48 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Tropical Shrimp Spinach Salad
Author: MISSYLYNMITZ
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'ounces pineapple juice', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'fluid', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'orange juice', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and deveined shrimp', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'large peeled cooked'}, {'ingredient': 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'baby spinach leaves', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bag', 'misc': '10 ounce'}, {'ingredient': '', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'mango', 'misc': 'seeded and diced peeled'}, {'ingredient': 'macadamia nuts', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'banana chips', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'dried'}, {'ingredient': 'crumbled goat cheese', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'sweetened flaked coconut', 'quantity': '0.75', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'toasted'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['3 fluid ounces pineapple juice', '3 tablespoons orange juice', '0.25 cup extra-virgin olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pound large peeled and deveined cooked shrimp', '1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves', '1 mango - peeled, seeded and diced', '0.5 cup chopped macadamia nuts', '0.5 cup dried banana chips', '4 ounces crumbled goat cheese', '0.75 cup sweetened flaked coconut, toasted']
Instructions: ['Prepare the salad dressing by whisking together the pineapple juice, orange juice, and 1/4 cup olive oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper  set aside. Brush the shrimp with 1 tablespoon of olive oil, and season to taste with salt and pepper  set aside. Place the spinach leaves, mango, macadamia nuts, and banana chips into a large mixing bowl.', 'Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat. Heat the shrimp in the skillet on both sides until just warm in the center, about 1 minute per side.', 'To assemble the salads, drizzle the spinach mixture with the salad dressing, and toss until evenly combined. Divide onto four plates. Divide the warm shrimp among the plates, and top with goat cheese. This way the goat cheese will melt down a little from the warmth of the grilled shrimp. Sprinkle with toasted coconut flakes to serve.']

Name: Vegan Turkish Baked Eggplant
Author: PJ's kitchen
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'eggplants', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'small', 'misc': 'sliced into 14-inch rounds'}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'extra-virgin olive oil', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'bell pepper', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'red', 'misc': 'seeded and chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'misc': 'crushed'}, {'ingredient': 'oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': 'drained and chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'tomato paste', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'red wine vinegar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'ground', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'toasted pine nuts', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'cilantro leaves', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': 'or to taste fresh'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 small eggplants, sliced into 1/4-inch rounds', 'salt to taste', '0.25 cup extra-virgin olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped', '1 clove garlic, crushed', '2 ounces oil-packed sun-dried tomatoes, drained and chopped', '2 tablespoons tomato paste', '1 teaspoon red wine vinegar', '0.5 teaspoon white sugar', 'ground black pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons toasted pine nuts, or to taste', '2 tablespoons fresh cilantro leaves, or to taste']
Instructions: ['Place eggplants in a colander. Sprinkle with salt and leave to drain for 30 minutes.', 'Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a baking pan.', 'Heat 1 tablespoon olive oil in a skillet. Add onion, red bell pepper, and garlic  cook until onion is soft, about 10 minutes. Stir in sun-dried tomatoes, tomato paste, vinegar, sugar, and pepper. Remove from heat.', 'Pat the eggplant slices dry with paper towels and arrange in the prepared baking pan. Drop a teaspoonful of the tomato mixture onto each eggplant slice. Drizzle remaining olive oil over and around slices. Cover with aluminum foil.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until eggplant slices are tender, 40 to 50 minutes. Garnish with pine nuts and cilantro leaves. Serve at room temperature.']

Name: Dora's Dandelions
Author: KASIA2
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'white potatoes', 'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'pounds', 'misc': 'peeled and cubed'}, {'ingredient': 'butter', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'and pepper', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': 'to taste'}, {'ingredient': 'bacon', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'torn dandelion greens', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'onion', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'misc': 'diced'}, {'ingredient': 'white vinegar', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'egg', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'misc': 'lightly beaten'}, {'ingredient': 'white sugar', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'all-purpose flour', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['5 pounds white potatoes, peeled and cubed', '3 tablespoons butter', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 pound bacon, diced', '1 pound torn dandelion greens', '1 medium onion, diced', '0.5 cup white vinegar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '1 tablespoon white sugar', '1 tablespoon all-purpose flour']
Instructions: ['Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain, toss with butter, and season with salt and pepper. Keep warm and set aside.', 'Place bacon in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium-high heat until evenly brown. Remove bacon and drain on paper towels. Set aside the skillet with bacon grease.', 'Gently toss together dandelion greens and onion in a large bowl until combined.', 'Whisk together vinegar, egg, and sugar in a small bowl until well combined  season with salt and pepper. Stir egg mixture into the skillet with warm bacon grease. Mix in bacon and flour  whisk until thickened to the consistency of salad dressing, about 1 minute. Pour at once over dandelion-onion mixture and toss to coat.', 'Serve greens over warm potatoes.']

Name: Vegan Chunky Chili

Instructions: ['Drain and rinse kidney beans, white beans and lentils. Combine in a large pot and cover with water  boil over medium-high to high heat for 1 hour, or until tender.', 'Meanwhile, in a large saucepan over high heat, combine tomatoes and water  bring to a boil. Ingredients_Raw: ['cooking spray', '1 spaghetti squash, halved and seeded', '0.25 cup butter', '1 shallot, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '0.5 (14.5 ounce) can pumpkin puree', '1 cup plain Greek yogurt', '0.25 cup grated Parmesan cheese', '1 teaspoon white truffle oil', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste']
Instructions: ['Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Coat a baking sheet with cooking spray.', 'Place the squash halves cut-side down onto the prepared baking sheet.', 'Bake in the preheated oven until the squash skin is easily pierced with a fork, 40 to 45 minutes. Remove from oven and allow to cool. Once the squash is cool enough to handle, shred squash flesh from rind using a fork  set aside in a large bowl.', 'Melt the butter in a skillet over medium heat  cook and stir the shallot and garlic in the hot butter until softened, 3 to 5 minutes. Stir the pumpkin puree, Greek yogurt, and Parmesan cheese with the shallot and garlic until well combined  cook until hot. Remove from heat and scrape the sauce into the bowl with the squash. Drizzle with the truffle oil  season with salt and pepper.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '188 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '14 g', 'Cholesterol': '31 mg', 'Fiber': '1 g', 'Protein': '5 g', 'Saturated Fat': '7 g', 'Sodium': '231 mg', 'Sugar': '3 g', 'Fat': '14 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Stuffing without a Turkey
Author: BALIA
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'bread stuffing mix', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'misc': '6 ounce dry'}, {'ingredient': 'lean beef', 'quantity': '1.5', 'unit': 'pounds', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'onions', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'potatoes', 'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'misc': 'ground'}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'pimento peppers', 'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'jars', 'misc': '4 ounce chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'black olives', 'quantity': '0.5', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'sweet pickles', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'finely chopped'}, {'ingredient': 'dill pickles', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': 'diced'}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['2 (6 ounce) packages dry bread stuffing mix', '1.5 pounds lean ground beef', '0.5 cup chopped onions', '0.25 teaspoon chopped garlic', '3 large potatoes, chopped', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '0.5 teaspoon ground black pepper', 'salt to taste', '2 (4 ounce) jars chopped pimento peppers', '0.5 cup chopped black olives', '0.25 cup sweet pickles, finely chopped', '0.25 cup dill pickles, diced']
Instructions: ['Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish.', 'Prepare the stuffing according to directions on package.', 'Over medium-low heat in a large saucepan, place the ground beef, onions and garlic. Slowly cook and stir until the onions are soft and the beef is evenly brown. Drain and set aside.', 'Place potatoes in a large, deep skillet with oil. Slowly cook and stir 10 minutes, or until evenly brown and tender, but firm.', 'Mix the stuffing, ground beef mixture, potatoes, pepper, salt, pimento peppers, olives, sweet pickles and dill pickles in the baking dish.', 'Return to the oven and bake 30 minutes. Serve hot.']
Nutrition: {'Calories': '537 kcal', 'Carbohydrates': '61 g', 'Cholesterol': '64 mg', 'Fiber': '6 g', 'Protein': '23 g', 'Saturated Fat': '8 g', 'Sodium': '905 mg', 'Sugar': '7 g', 'Fat': '22 g', 'Unsaturated Fat': '0 g'}

Name: Squirrel's Great Beef Steak
Author: Squirrel
Ingredients: [{'ingredient': 'soy sauce', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'italian-style salad dressing', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'barbeque sauce', 'quantity': '0.25', 'unit': 'cup', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'vegetable oil', 'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'garlic', 'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'misc': 'peeled and minced'}, {'ingredient': 'seasoning to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'steak', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'salt to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'seasoning', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'salt', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'black pepper to taste', 'quantity': '', 'unit': 'ground', 'misc': ''}, {'ingredient': 'beef sirloin steak', 'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'ounces', 'misc': ''}]
Ingredients_Raw: ['0.25 cup soy sauce', '0.25 cup Italian-style salad dressing', '0.25 cup barbeque sauce', '4 tablespoons vegetable oil', '1 clove garlic, peeled and minced', 'steak seasoning to taste', 'seasoning salt to taste', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste', '10 ounces beef sirloin steak']
Instructions: ['In a medium bowl, mix soy sauce, Italian-style salad dressing, barbeque sauce, vegetable oil, garlic, steak seasoning, seasoning salt, salt and ground black pepper.
